name: Verydisco
description:
The era of exploring the universe is now! You start as an explorer from earth with the ambitious goal to visit as many planets as you can. Your only enemy is gravity itself.

Verydisco is a arcade-like game which is easy to learn and hard to master. The game was created for the ScoreSpace Jam #7.

Controls:

  • Up/Left Mouse: Accelerate
  • Down/Right Mouse: Break
  • Up/Left Mouse: Restart

Tips:

  • Avoid black holes (especially big ones)
  • Green flags mark your already discovered planets
  • Use the force of gravity wisely to loop in your desired direction

Used assets:

  • Music: Eva – 失望した [Synthwave] from Royalty Free Planet
  • Sound: Explosion, Coin from sharesynth from freesound.org
